bike.description: 6061 T6 aluminum main frame, carbon seatstays & chainstays, E2 integrated head tube, BB86 integrated bottom bracket

components.description: Bontrager carbon FCC, carbon E2 1-1/8" - 1.5" steerer, wide stance carbon legs, accepts 25mm hub endcaps, integrated SpeedTrap computer mount
